All Implemented Interfaces:

public class ActivitySignup extends androidx.appcompat.app.AppCompatActivity
Activity class for user signup in the Fitness Tracker app. Handles user registration and allows updates to email, username, and password. Communicates with a backend server using Volley for network requests.

      private boolean isInputValid(String username, String password, String confirmPassword, String email)
      Validates the user input for signup.
      Parameters:
      username - The entered username.
      password - The entered password.
      confirmPassword - The confirmation of the entered password.
      email - The entered email address.
      Returns:
      True if input is valid, otherwise false.
